word: Our Saviour could receive the heavenly revelation without becoming self-exalted. . . . The enemy is subtle and very daring, but he is not invincible. He is a strong man armed, but if we keep close to the Captain of our salvation, using the weapon that He has given us, we shall be victorious.—Letter 159, 1903 (Manuscript Releases, vol. 21, pp. 9, 10).
